title: Quantitative and equipment-free paper-based agglutination assay of bacterial cells
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20516-20528
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03001J, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Mohammad Al-Tamimi, Shahed Altarawneh, Minas A. Mustafa, Mariam El-sallaq, Penelope Shihab
A simple, quantitative, equipment-free, paper-based point-of-care (POC) assays that report results as text/numbers are useful for bedside/home applications, emergencies, frequent follow-ups, and resource-limited areas.
